dealCard() - Method in class uno.cards.Deck
This method deals one card from the top of the deck.
dealer - Variable in class uno.player.Player
 
Deck - Class in uno.cards
Deck provides a standard deck of 108 UNO cards.

The simulated deck Pile, initially empty.

Holds the card discarded, null if not called.
doIDraw() - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
